definition[0]: an inland area, city etc is not near the coast
example[0]: the largest area of inland water in the southeast
definition[1]: in a direction away from the coast and towards the centre of a country
example[1]: The mountains are five miles inland.
definition[2]: inland mail or TRANSPORT services are those used for letters or goods being sent within a country, not abroad
example[3]: The letter was lost in the inland post.
definition[3]: an inland area, city, point etc is away from the coast
example[5]: Loading starts not at the port, but at inland depots.
example[6]: ships that operate on inland waterways
